p: Particularly interesting is the integral utilization of the raw material, following a biorefinery approach. In order to make use of all seaweed components requires a rational processing of the whole material, and the algal processing by-products according to the biorefinery concept to allow a complete utilization of biomass [ 19, 264, 265]. This alternative processing approach would provide different products and applications, favoring the economics of a process that would not rely exclusively on one product and could be adapted to the demand and needs of different sectors.
